title: Interpretation of hugging a dead person in a dream: seeing a dead person kissing in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of hugging and kissing the arms of the deceased about the unmarried woman, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the divorced woman, the married man and the single young man, both with tears. I dreamed of my father, my brother, my husband, my lover, my fiancé, my dead ex-wife, alive and kissing me, hugging me and more Ibn Sirin: Hugging a dead person Interpretation of a hug In a dream in general, if you see someone hugging someone in a dream, it means that your life will be long. If the person you are hugging in a dream is someone you know in real life, this indicates that the bond between you will last a lifetime. If the person is not known in your life, this indicates a nice conversation. If someone has a grudge against you and you hug him in a dream, it means that you are leaving the war with your opponents and establishing friendly relations with them. As for seeing yourself hugging your wives/husbands, this indicates that the love between you will deepen. Interpretation of hugging a dead person in a dream. Embracing the dead person with the dreamer, if it is with love and tenderness, then it indicates the long life of the dreamer, but if it involves fear or long attachment, it indicates perseverance or does not appear. Kindness, it carries such evil as the proximity of death. From the dreamer, or conveying his sins. As for the dreamer who embraces the dead person in his dream, then mixes with him, or talks with him, or walks with him and talks to him, this indicates the longevity of the dreamer, God willing. Seeing a dead person alive and hugging him in a dream shows that the owner The vision will witness an important and surprising development that will make him forget what he experienced and find sympathy for an incident that caused him pain, misery, and distress, and this will be the most appropriate treatment for him. Seeing a deceased husband or wife alive and hugging him in a dream means that the person will face difficulties in getting used to a situation that he must get used to, accept and live. Seeing a dead grandfather alive and hugging him in a dream indicates the presence of a person who whenever the dreamer remembers, hurts inside, and whose face is laughing and yet he suffers from his loss. It announces the presence of a beautiful and precious person even in his sadness, who always remains in the heart and mind. Interpretation of hugging a dead person in a dream. The dreamer will attain good luck, healthy awareness, speedy recovery from all diseases, complete prosperity of his future, release of all his worries, and complete improvement of his condition. Seeing hugging a dead person in Dream: This dream indicates health and the dreamer will get closer to the comfort he wants and will live a happy, comfortable and peaceful life. The dream indicates that the dreamer spends his life with love and happiness, and enjoys all aspects of life, which enables him to achieve all his dreams and desires. Interpretation of shaking hands with a dead person in a dream. Whoever sees that a dead person shook hands with him and greeted him. Accordingly, this explains the condition of the dead person with his Lord, God willing. He may despair of obtaining it. Interpretation of kissing the dead in a dream: As for someone who receives a dead person whom he does not know, he will be given money from a source he does not know, and if the deceased knows the fortuneteller, he will benefit from the money of the deceased’s inheritance. His knowledge or leaving his family behind. As for someone kissing an unknown dead person in a dream, this indicates good waiting for the king or accepting goodness in a matter that he does not want due to small and hidden things. title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a tooth being extracted

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a tooth coming out in a dream: Seeing a tooth being removed is one of the visions that leave a bad impression upon waking, and this vision has a different meaning, and this contradiction is due to various factors, including the age at which the dreamer is removing it? It can be lower, front, or upper, and each tooth has its own symbol, and therefore we find that the indicators differ clearly based on the complete knowledge of the tooth, molar, or canine that was removed, and what concerns us in this article is to mention the indicators and cases of dreaming of tooth extraction in a dream. Learn about Interpretation of a dream about a tooth being pulled out in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a tooth being pulled Thinking, distraction and a feeling of loss. If teeth symbolize relatives and family members, then pulling a tooth indicates strife and decay, violating family rules and customs, or stopping mercy and avoiding family relationships and ties. If a person sees teeth eroding or shaking from the excretory system, this is evidence of... He has been exposed to a serious disaster or is going through a major crisis and strong fluctuations. If the tooth is broken, this indicates the imminent death of someone close to the fortuneteller or the arrival of sad news that will leave painful effects on his heart. Seeing a knocked out tooth could be a sign of spending on useless things or taking money. And putting it in things that a person hates or is forced to do. The tooth that he removes replaces a member of his family, and if the tooth is one of the upper teeth, this indicates mention of the family. Interpretation of the dream of tooth extraction by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes in his interpretation of the vision of teeth that this vision expresses the dreamer’s family and relatives. The upper teeth symbolize male relatives, while the lower teeth symbolize female relatives. As for seeing a tooth coming out in a dream, this vision indicates a serious health problem that can last for a long time and recovery from it is imminent. If the tooth moves from its place, this indicates a serious illness and extraction. The tooth here is evidence of solving problems from their roots, getting rid of adversity, overcoming hardships, and recovering from diseases. However, if the tooth is healthy and the person extracts it, then it symbolizes the rupture of the womb, the separation of family ties, and rebellion against its customs and laws. Seeing a tooth coming out in a dream according to Ibn Sirin is a sign that you are passing through In serious crises, you have to do things that the person does not want or accept and take positions that may seem cruel and wrong to others. If the tooth rots and is extracted, this indicates the presence of a defect in one of the family members and the viewer’s intention to remove it or remove it permanently. A rotten tooth indicates defects and shortcomings, words Biting, many arguments and ugly praise. Interpretation of a dream about having a tooth extracted by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says that age in a dream denotes death, life, burial, secrets, personality, events, money, benefits, and long journeys. If someone sees that he is extracting his tooth, this symbolizes the end of a problem,

title: Interpretation of a dream about driving a car in a dream with the head of state

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about driving a car with a head of state in a dream. Are you looking for the meaning of the interpretation of a dream about driving a car with a head of state in a dream? In the following lines, we learn about all of this and more... Interpretation of a dream about driving a car in a dream with a head of state. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car with a head of state in a dream may express his high status, and God knows the unseen. When you see a married man driving a car with a head of state, this may indicate his status. Highness, and God knows best. While if the dreamer sees himself riding in a car with a head of state in the back seat, this may be evidence of a promotion at work, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself driving a luxury car with a head of state, this may mean that he will reach a position of prestige, and God is Most High. And I know the interpretation of a dream about driving an open car in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about driving an open car in a dream can be evidence of instability, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a single girl driving a car without a roof indicates a loss of self-confidence, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself driving a car in a dream, this may be evidence of changes. And God knows the unseen. Also, driving a car can indicate some emergency situations, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. Interpretation of the dream of driving a car with my daughter in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of driving a car with my daughter in a dream could represent marriage, and God knows best. And since if an unmarried girl sees herself driving a car in a dream, it may be that Evidence of her marriage to a good man, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself riding in a car with someone she loves, this may indicate good changes, and God knows best. When a married woman sees her daughter driving a car in a dream, this may indicate a good situation, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream that I I drive an old car in a dream. The interpretation of dreaming that I am driving an old car in a dream can lead to achieving goals, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself driving an old car, this may indicate that he will be able to achieve his goals that he abandoned, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When he sees a married man driving a car Old expresses goodness, and God knows best. If a single girl is seen driving an old car, it may be a sign of returning to an old relationship, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams that I am driving a plane in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that I am driving a plane in a dream could be a sign of finishing things. A vision of traveling by plane can also express Closeness to God, and God has knowledge of the unseen. When you see a single girl flying by plane, it may be a travel, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. In the event that a married woman sees a plane, this can lead to a quick transition, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams that I am driving a car with someone I know in a dream. Interpretation of the dream that Riding in a car with someone I know in a dream could indicate a new beginning, and God knows the unseen. Riding a car with someone you know expresses goodness and happiness, God willing. Seeing a single girl driving a car for someone you know could mean a happy marriage, and God knows what is unseen. title: The 6 most famous interpretations of seeing a child in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing an unmarried woman with a child? Evidence of her success in her studies or work. The meaning of seeing a man with a child but he is ugly and weak? It means that he is exposed to problems from someone close to him. What is the interpretation of seeing a baby? A sign of kindness and blessing. Interpretation of seeing a child Small in a dream? An indication of an enemy who is lurking for you and does not understand you because he is weak. What is the interpretation of selling a woman? It means distress, worry, and sadness after goodness. Interpretation of a dream about a child for an unmarried woman. Interpretation of dreams for a single woman who has a child to succeed in her studies or work. A dream about a child for an engaged girl, This engagement will soon culminate in marriage. If a girl sees a child, but does not remember anything about the shape or features of this child, this means that there are problems in her life. If she sees a beautiful child, this means her marriage to a generous man with good character. A beautiful child means that An unmarried woman enjoys happiness and psychological comfort in her marriage. A child who sees a man in a dream. If a man dreams of a child, but he is ugly and weak, this means that he will be exposed to problems from someone close to him. If this man works, then seeing an infant in a dream means that you are trying to make money. An ugly child means poverty and loss. If a man dreams that he is harming a child by hitting, this means that he has wronged someone around him. If he shouts at a child, this means that he is causing great psychological harm to someone. Playing with young children in a dream is good news for success and achievement. What one desires. If a man sees in a dream that a child is walking on his feet, it means that he is an independent and successful person. Symbol of a child in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a child is a sign of goodness and blessings. A dream about a baby girl, it means that the dreamer will take care of the dreamer. If he touches young children In a dream, and the person was worried, anxiety turns into joy. A child is the beginning of a new life and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a child by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a small child in a dream is a sign that the enemy is hiding inside you, but he does not understand you because he is weak. A child is considered an enemy in a man’s dreams Because he is your friend at first, then that friendship turns into enmity. If one dreams that he returns a child he bought, this means that virility and manhood will be lost. Carrying a small child in your arms for Shirin’s son is acquiring wealth that you take from a stranger. Interpretation of a dream about many children: It indicates To anxiety, because children spend a long and difficult time raising children. A girl in a dream by the interpreter Ibn Sirin means goodness and blessings for the dreamer in general. A dream about buying a child means that the owner of this dream will suffer from some anxiety if the child is a boy. A dream about buying a boy in a dream means good Selling a child, even if you mention it, means goodness after hardship. Selling a female means distress, worry, and grief after goodness.

title: Interpretation of the entrance to a church in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the church in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married man, or a single young man. Whether you dream of praying in a church or dream of entering a church and more, or not: Interpretation of a church in a dream. The church symbolizes death, the cemetery, and the afterlife. The church can symbolize a liquor store and can To symbolize the consumption of alcohol. The church refers to immoral houses and symbolizes forbidden acts such as singing and dancing. The church indicates sadness, crying, problems and difficult solutions that the dreamer may face in his life. The dreamer who is not loyal to the teachings of religion and who is outside the path of truth and who sees the church in his dream indicates that he will be one of People of Hell. The dreamer who committed an unwanted act will be held accountable under the law, such as murder, for example, and he saw the church in her nipple, which indicates that he will be imprisoned. Interpretation of the church in a dream by Ibn Sirino. The interpretation of seeing the church is a comprehensive interpretation in all cases for all men and pregnant women. Unmarried people, divorced people, widows, married women, their relationship with their families, their sorrows, their joys, etc. The church, in the eyes of Ibn Sirin, is the cemetery, or death, or the house of the adulteress, or a place and store in which alcohol is sold or drunk. It also stipulates houses of immorality, infidelity, and immorality, such as clans, fornication, dancing, and singing. Many commentators unanimously agree with Ibn Sirin in establishing hell for the guilty or perpetrator of sins and imprisonment for whoever accepts the act. Who knows that it is forbidden by religion or law. And in the event that the dreamer sees that he is inside the church and prays or remembers God or cries reverently, then he will visit and enter the cemetery or the funeral of the deceased, but in the case of crying or weeping. Like a sinner or carrying something that portends distress and anxiety, it is the prison that he enters, but if he sees inside a church a dead person or a funeral; Because someone left religion by his own actions and entered Hell. From Hell if he does not repent and repent for his deeds, and it is said that it is a severe warning to the pioneer to return to his religion due to the imminence of his guardianship. As for whoever enters the church while reciting verses or the Qur’an or calling to prayer, if that person or the dreamer has gone out in jihad and fighting, then he will be victorious over his enemy and those with him. . He prays with people in church and does the same with them and follows their customs, and if he is a man who follows a path in which there is disbelief, heresy, adultery, drinking alcohol or great sin such as forbidden drums, crazy singing and pipes, and if you worship with him before the cross, you will work on the drums because the cross is wooden. Usually in churches, but if it's a woman, she'll go to a wedding where there are drums. Bandanas and nudity are forbidden, or receiving a funeral for someone you love in which there will be sadness, mourning, blackness, and mourning. Interpretation of the church in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says that the church indicates knowledge, asceticism in this world, fear of the Creator, and screaming out of fear, and at other times it indicates sadness, worry, anxiety, lies, slander against chaste women, slander, slander, and heresies. And fun. In musical instruments and dancing, because it indicates the unjust master or ruler. It is R

title: Interpretation of the symbol of the mother in a dream. Secrets of interpreting the dream of the mother in good and evil

preview.html: The encyclopedia provides an interpretation of the symbol of the mother in a dream. A mother is a source of tenderness and affection for her children. It is a child's first school and a role model. He takes responsibility for himself and the entire family. She is a source of strength and confidence for her children. Interpretation of a dream about a mother in a dream. Details from the Encyclopedia. The dreamer often sees a woman in a dream in different circumstances, whether she is a wife, sister, or friend, while seeing a mother is what makes the dreamer rush to search for consequences. This vision of how wonderful her place is in the lives of her children at all stages of their lives. They can stay away from her and there is nothing in their heart that can take her away from her who has been called the Lady of the Dream and from whom no other woman can take that title. The mandate that God Almighty made obedience to a mother and her justice in duties that should not be compromised, which is evident from the repetition It is mentioned in the verses of wisdom and the Holy Qur’an, where God Almighty said in a surah. Luqman verse 14 (And We commanded the man to take care of his parents, his pregnant woman, and the wretched and neglected, his mothers and his children). These are the situations that a mother may see in a dream, where she comes to her son happy and laughing as he is. You may see her hugging him or making him sad, crying, blaming him, or scolding him, while it is among the visions that make the dreamer want to know its interpretation. To see a dead mother alive. In a dream, and we will provide complete interpretations of these dreams, so follow us. Interpretation of the symbol of the mother in a dream. According to what was narrated by Ibn Sirin, he narrated the interpretation of seeing the mother in a dream: Seeing the mother in a dream, in a situation in which the dreamer is anxious or sad, symbolizes a change in his situation for the better and the removal of His anxiety. Seeing the mother in a dream laughing with hope indicates many good things that the dreamer will have in his next life. The mother standing in the dreamer’s house in a dream shows the goodness that will prevail in his home and family. Talking with the mother in a dream indicates the end of the dreamer’s confusion about Something and make the right decision. Seeing a mother at home indicates family and financial stability. Seeing a poor man who owes his mother to give birth to him again symbolizes the repayment of his debt, while a sick person indicates the expiration of his term and only God knows the conditions. Seeing a living mother crying in a dream indicates A disease that will afflict her in the coming period, but if the mother dies, this means that the dreamer will contract the disease, God forbid. Seeing a mother alive in reality while she is dead in a dream symbolizes the pain that the dreamer is going through. The symbol of the mother in a single woman’s dream. Seeing a mother in a dream has many meanings. Among the symbols we mention them as follows: Seeing a mother still alive in one dream indicates the mother’s interest in the visions or her sadness for her in some matters. Seeing a happy dead mother in a dream symbolizes her satisfaction with her daughter. Seeing a dead mother in one dream indicates The goodness that the dreamer will receive in the coming period, perhaps engagement or marriage. Seeing a dead mother in a dream indicates her need for prayer and zakat. Interpretation of a dream about a mother in a dream The scholar and jurist Ibn Sirin mentioned many indications of seeing a mother in a dream, which we will explain with the following points.

title: Interpretation of Medina in a dream

preview.html: Medina is one of God's purest places on earth. Thus, the encyclopedia presents an article on the interpretation of Medina in a dream. The Messenger - may God bless him and grant him peace - migrated from Mecca to Medina in the second migration. This is due to the danger of the polytheists harming him in Mecca and the choice of the Prophet of Medina over other countries. Proving the status of this country with the Messenger of God - may God bless him and grant him peace. The chosen Prophet established brotherhood between the expatriates and the Ansar, reconciled the neighboring Jewish tribes, and Muslims and others lived in peace and security.Interpretation of Medina in a dreamInterpretation of seeing Medina in a dream according to Ibn SirinIf Medina had all this virtue. If a person sees Medina in his dream, this is evidence that God Almighty will bless him in all his deeds and that God will give him a Umrah or Hajj soon to the Sacred House of God. Interpretation of a dream about Medina in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi If a person sees Medina in his dream, this is evidence of goodness and blessing in life. Sustenance, and evidence of the health of this servant, and if he sees that he is standing in front of the Holy Kaaba and in front of the Prophet’s room. This is evidence that this person has sincerely repented to God with sincere repentance, and after that he will never return to disobedience and injustice. But if he sees that he is about to perform the rituals of Hajj or Umrah. This is evidence that God Almighty will relieve this person of his distress and delusions and grant him security and peace. Interpretation of the dream of Medina according to Ibn Shaheen If a person sees Medina in his dream, this is evidence that God Almighty will give him a lot of money and bless him in his trade and work. As for whoever sees himself in front of The grave of the Messenger - may God bless him and grant him peace - is evidence that this person is righteous, and that God Almighty accepts his deeds. Because for the sake of God Almighty there is no hypocrisy or deception. But if a person sees himself in the Sacred Mosque. This is evidence that Almighty God will grant this man success and reward throughout his life, and God will also allow him to visit God’s Holy House. - Performing the rituals of Umrah or Hajj. Interpretation of seeing Medina when married and if a married woman sees Medina in a dream. This is evidence that God will grant this woman much good, bless her children, and treat her with justice in this world and the hereafter. This is evidence that God will grant her the blessing of children soon. Interpretation of seeing Medina when she is free. If an unmarried woman sees Medina in her dream, this is evidence that God Almighty will marry that woman soon, and that the marriage will be with a man of good morals and religion, and he will marry her to visit her. Holy house of God. To perform the Hajj obligation. Also, seeing Medina indicates ample provision, and that God Almighty will accept her prayers, and her life will be stable. Interpretation of seeing Medina while pregnant, and if a pregnant woman sees Medina in a dream. This is evidence that God Almighty will facilitate this woman’s birth, as well as evidence of the beauty of her new baby, and that the newborn will be of good character and religion, and will honor her in her life by doing good for her in this.

title: Learn the interpretation of seeing a bicycle in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a bicycle in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a bicycle in a dreamWhat is the interpretation of seeing riding a bicycle in a dream? What did the interpreters say about the interpretation of a dream that you are riding a bike with someone in a dream? What are the most accurate signs to see cycling easily? Learn about these interpretations in the following article. Do you have a confusing dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. A bicycle in a dream. There are several main visions that explain in detail the interpretation of a bicycle dream, as follows: Watching a bicycle tour: It is interpreted that the dreamer does not despair of struggle and diligence and throughout his life he knocks on many doors to obtain legitimate money and the scene shows empowerment and achieving the desired goal. Seeing a bicycle in a dream and getting off of it and riding another bicycle: It indicates a transition and a noticeable change in the life of the visionary, so that he can move from one job to another or leave an old life that was annoying and move to another, happier life. The best thing about this vision is that the visionary leaves the old bike and rides the new bike so that the vision is interpreted as developing for the better in his life. Seeing the bike broken down: It indicates the cessation of the dreamer’s interests and the difficulty of achieving desires, and he may stop working and earning money. Seeing yourself riding a bike And it falls from it: It shows that the dreamer will face many problems that are difficult to solve, and as a result he will not fulfill his requirements and achieve his desires. Seeing a bike with a person in a dream: It is interpreted by the relationship of engagement and marriage that occurs between the fortuneteller and the girl he drives, and if the person who led the fortuneteller With him in a dream is one of his colleagues at work, this indicates their involvement in establishing a profitable project or company, God willing, and if they reach a beautiful place in the dream, this is explained by their arrival at the desired profits. The bicycle in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin did not mention the symbol of the bicycle in his writings because it It was invented many years after his death, but he spoke of means of transportation from one place to another, such as camels, horses and all animals, and of the bicycle leading. The same function as an animal is to transport humans from one place to another. Otherwise, most signs apply to him. If the dreamer finds a bike in a dream and rides it and is able to ride it professionally, this is a sign that he drives and has strong control over the affairs of his life. Since a bike is a means of transportation that needs a great degree of balance in reality, riding in a dream It means achieving physical and social balance in life. The most accurate indicators of seeing a bicycle in a dream. A bicycle in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman is able to ride a bicycle professionally in a dream, she controls her feelings and shows them only to those who truly deserve them. An unmarried woman who rides a bicycle in a dream and she did it and enjoyed it. With her while she is awake, the dream is subject to the pain of dreams. When an unmarried woman rides a bicycle and reaches a beautiful and bright place in a dream, this is good news that she will be saved from difficulties and soon she will rejoice in the successes and happy events that God has bestowed upon her.

title: I dreamed that my husband married me

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing my husband marry me in a dream about a single girl: In the event that an unmarried girl sees in a dream that the husband is marrying his wife in her dream. State that she will find a wonderful job according to her skills and abilities. Also, the dream could be a sign of the girl’s constant pursuit of the things she wants from life When she sees a man getting married and marrying his wife in a dream. A vision that brings her happiness, because she will achieve the things she wants and will plan for them until she achieves them and succeeds by God’s command. As for the husband marrying his wife, he is her sister’s husband. A sign of constant encouragement from her sister until she thought seriously. In marriage. Also, the previous vision shows the happiness that everyone experiences. And if she dreams that she is married and her husband is marrying her. This dream symbolizes her suffering from her emotional state and the crises that she faces. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a wedding party in a dream. Interpretation of the witness: My husband married me in a dream to a married woman when A married woman sees that she sees a man marrying his wife and being her husband. It is a sign of a life without controversy, and marital disputes between them, as their life is peaceful. In the event that she sees herself as the one who wants her husband to marry her and she chooses her. This symbolizes her continued support for him, until he reaches a position Distinguished and distinguished in society. The dream also indicates the feelings of love that this woman feels. Seeing a woman’s husband getting married in a dream and not knowing the woman is something that does not attract praise from them. It foretells that her husband will be injured in an accident that may lead to his death. And God Almighty knows. Perhaps the dream Previous is the appearance of a disease that has no cure, and there is no cure for it due to frequent supplication and seeking forgiveness. It could be seeing a husband marrying his wife in a dream. This dream stems from the real fear that struck her once, that her husband would really marry her. Interpretation of marrying a wife in a dream for a man and its meaning: If Someone saw in a dream that he is marrying his wife in a dream. It shows that he will be able to overcome difficult problems in his life and will come out with experience in trading. When a man dreams that he is marrying his wife in a dream. It indicates that the circumstances of his arrival to a high position with great influence have changed, then God is supreme. And I know. And seeing an unknown woman that a man marries his wife in a dream. It symbolizes secrets in his life and he does not reveal them to anyone, no matter what. Perhaps the previous vision knows what this man does to leave memories in his diary, and God knows best. That a man marries his wife in a dream indicates The effort that a man makes to secure requirements, overcome difficulties, avoid them for the sake of his family, and continue it so that nothing affects him, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a wedding in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The meaning of seeing that my husband married me in a dream about a pregnant woman and its interpretation. If a pregnant woman dreams of marrying her. She says Her pregnancy is the result of her thinking about how to draw her husband’s attention to her because she ignores him, and it affects her, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. In the event that her husband marries a friend who is very close to her. A sign of her importance in focusing on her life with her husband, because she can think about this woman, so she must Be careful

title: Learn more about the interpretation of cooked rice in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Rice is one of the famous foods that we do not forget in our daily tables, and if we see it in a dream, it has many connotations and interpretations, especially since the interpretation of the vision differs from one person to another, as it differs accordingly. To the dream interpreter who interpreted this vision. What is the interpretation of seeing cooked rice in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? The scholar Ibn Sirin says that cooked rice in a dream indicates that the dreamer will have great benefit in the near future. Also, eating cooked white rice indicates that the dreamer He will receive a large sum of money in the coming period, but after toil and hardship. Ibn Sirin also believes that eating rice in a dream means that you will hear some good news in the near future. Cooked rice indicates a promotion at work or it may indicate getting rid of enemies and achieving victory over them. Interpretation of seeing cooked rice in a dream for a single woman. Some dream interpreters say that an unmarried girl who sees herself cooking rice in a dream will get married soon. If the cooked rice is white, the vision indicates her marriage to a well-off person. When this rice is not cooked enough This may indicate that there are many fears and problems awaiting this girl in the near future. A lot of rice in a girl’s dream indicates abundant livelihood and a good position at work or obtaining excellent grades in studies. What is the interpretation of seeing cooked rice in a dream for a married woman? Interpretation of seeing cooked rice in a dream: Al-Nabulsi believes that a woman who prepares cooked rice in a dream for her husband and children is evidence that this woman enjoys stability in married life. It also indicates that the husband’s financial circumstances will ease soon and that he will have a lot of money. The couple could be Two people eating cooked rice in a dream is a sign of the approaching pregnancy of this wife. If a married woman sees that she is preparing a large feast with a large amount of rice, this indicates that there is good news about the marriage of children or a close brother or the acquisition of an inheritance or a large livelihood. You have a dream that confuses you. Wait for it.. Google Egyptian dream interpretation website.
